content.html:
Students will complete the following questions to practice the skills they have learned in this lesson.

For questions 1–4, add the equations in the system to find a new equation.

1. \( \left\{ \begin{array}{c l} 6x - 5y = -1\\ -6x - 3y = -39 \end{array}\right. \)

  1.   \(2y = –38\)
  2. \(–2y = –40\)
  3. \(–8y = –40\)
  4. \(–8x = –40\)

ANSWER: \( -8y = -40 \)

2. \( \left\{ \begin{array}{c l} 5x - 3y = -1\\ -6x + 3y = -6 \end{array}\right. \)

  1.   \(x = –7 or –x = 7\)
  2. \(–x = –7 or x = 7\)
  3. \(–6x = –7 or 6x = 7\)
  4. \(–11x = –7 or 11x = 7\)

ANSWER: \( -x = -7 \) or \( x = 7 \)

3. \( \left\{ \begin{array}{c l} 4x - 3y = 3\\ -4x - 10y = 62 \end{array}\right. \)

  1. \(–13y = 65\)
  2. \(–8x = 65\)
  3. \( –8y = 65\)
  4. \(–13x = 65\)

ANSWER: \( -13y = 65 \)

4. \( \left\{ \begin{array}{c l} 6x + 16y = -6\\ -6x - 10y = 6 \end{array}\right. \)

  1. \(6y = 0 or y = 0\)
  2. \(6x = 0 or x = 0\)
  3. \(12x = 0 or x = 0\)
  4. \(6y = 12 or y = 6\)

ANSWER: \( 6y = 0 \) or \( y = 0 \)

For questions 5–10, solve each system of equations.

5. \( \left\{ \begin{array}{c l} 6x + 27y = -12\\ -6x - 26y = 14 \end{array}\right. \)

  1. (2.5,–1)
  2. (–11,2)
  3. (7,–1)
  4. (–20,4)

ANSWER: \( x = -11, y = 2 \)

6. \( \left\{ \begin{array}{c l} 3x + 4y = 8\\ -3x + 6y = 42 \end{array}\right. \)

  1. (–10,2)
  2. (–14,0)
  3. (–4,5)
  4. (0,7)

ANSWER: \( x = -4, y = 5 \)

7. \( \left\{ \begin{array}{c l} 5x - 9y = 68\\ -5x + 6y = -47 \end{array}\right. \)

  1. (7,–2)
  2. (13,3)
  3. (19,3)
  4. (1,–7)

ANSWER: \( x = 1, y = -7 \)

8. \( \left\{ \begin{array}{c l} -3x + 5y = -57\\ 8x - 5y = 77 \end{array}\right. \)

  1. (19,0)
  2. (4,–9)
  3. (14,–3)
  4. (–1,–17)

ANSWER: \( x = 4, y = -9 \)

9. \( \left\{ \begin{array}{c l} 4x - 2y = -28\\ -7x + 2y = 46 \end{array}\right. \)

  1. (0,14)
  2. (–4,6)
  3. (–8,–5)
  4. (–6,2)

ANSWER: \( x = -6, y = 2 \)

10. \( \left\{ \begin{array}{c l}  -2x + 3y = 23\\ 2x - 6y = -56 \end{array}\right. \)

  1. (5,11)
  2. (2,9)
  3. (8,12)
  4. (8,13)

ANSWER: \( x = 5 \), \( y = 11 \)
